User wants to access VM via ssh key authentication

If a user want to access linux VM in openstack with ssh key.

If this user is not from UTEC 6, he or she has to do two things, supply his ssh public key and notify the admin system(Pengfei, Pierre).

If this user is from UTEC 6, he or she need to go to https://gitlab.in2p3.fr/bioaster/Bioaster_OS_SSH_KEY, commit his public key, and notify the admin system (i.e. Pengfei, Pierre)
